definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: only 1Ch 12:17 (peculiar) [[יִהְיֶה־לִּי עֲלֵיכֶׂם לֵבָב לֳי֑חַד]] I will have a heart toward you for unitedness, i.e. my heart shall be ready to become one with yours (cf. v:1Ch 12:38 [[סלב אחד]]).

definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: in union, together (cf. Ar. wah.dun in acc. with sf. in his solitariness = alone)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: together, of community in action, place, or time (oft. combined, but one usu. more prominent than the others); (1) in action, Job 38:7 [[בְּרָן־יֵחַד]] [[כּוֹכְבֵי אֵל]] when the stars of God shouted together; Ezr 4:3 we together will build (opp. to you), with [[נִלְחַם]] 1Sa 17:10, [[נִשְׁפַּט]] Is 43:26; (2) in place 1Sa 11:11 [[ולא נשׁארו בם שׁנים יׇ֑חַד]]; 2Sa 10:15 [[וַיֵּאָֽסְפוּ יׇחַָד]] Ps 2:2, Ps 31:14, Ps 88:18, Ps 133:1 [[שֶׁבֶת יַחַד]] Is 50:8, as pred. Mic 2:12 [[יַחַד אֲשִׂימֶנּוּ]]; (3) in place and time at once. 2Sa 21:9 [[וַיִּפְּלוּ יׇ֑חַד]] and they perished together, 2Sa 14:16 to destroy [[אתי ואת בני יחד]]; (4) of time alone (poet.) Is 42:14 [[אֶשּׁׂם וְאֶשְׁאַף יחד]] I will gasp and pant together, Is 45:8, Job 6:2, Job 17:16, Ps 141:10 [[יחד אנכי עד אעבור]] while I at the same time pass on.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: all together, altogether (poet. syn. of [[כֻּלָּם]] but more forcible, suggesting oft., esp. with [[כל]], all at once, as well as altogether), Is 44:11 [[יפחדו יבשׁו יחד]] (cf. Ps 40:15), Ps 62:10 [[הֵמָּה מֵהֶבֶל יַחַד]] they are all together (made) of vanity, Is 22:3 [[כל קחיניך נדדו יחד]] (with [[כל]] also Ps 41:8, Job 34:15): oft. in poet. beginning a clause with emph., De 33:5, Job 3:18 [[יחד אסירים שׁאננו]] Job 16:10, Job 19:12 [[יחד יבאו]] [[גדודיו]], Job 24:4, Job 31:38, Ps 41:8, Ps 98:8, Ho 11:7 (with a neg.), v:Ho 11:8; in connexion with a sf., or obj. of a vb., Is 27:4 [[אחיתנה יׇ֑חַד]] I will burn it altogether, Ps 33:15 [[הַיּׁחֵר יַחַד לִבָּם]] who formeth the hearts of them all together, Ps 74:6, Ps 74:8, Job 10:8 [[יַחַד סָבִיב]] altogether round about (but rd. perh. with LXX SyrVer Del Di [[אַחַר תִסּוֹב]]), Job 40:13.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: together, in the sense of alike, the one as well as the other, Ps 49:3, Ps 49:11 [[יחד]] [[כסיל ובער יאבדו]] Job 21:26, Job 34:29. More frequent is
